extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 4 and registered in a COMP Major or BMCO or COCA or COGS or COMA or CSCI or SODE Specialization Plan and (CISC365 or COGS300).

basic.description: A wide range of topics of current importance in computing, including technical issues, professional questions, and moral and ethical decisions. Students make presentations, deliver papers, and engage in discussion.
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Social, Ethical and Legal Issues in Computing
